meaning_str.bing:
n. 结论；结束；结果；结尾
网络. 总结；结语；结束语

结论；推论；结局；结尾；缔结；商定；命题

1.en: As you approach the end of this year, it may be your conclusion that the many events we have continually spoken of must get underway.
1.cn: 由于你们在接近今年的末尾，这许多将发生的事件将可能是你们的结论，这些我们已经频繁提及的必须落实的事情。

2.en: I've come to the conclusion that we've got to be careful about how we toss around the term bully.
2.cn: 我逐渐得出这个结论：我们务必要谨慎地使用“欺负人”这个词。

3.en: In conclusion, the data strongly suggest that if you're single, you (or someone you know) should learn a little bit about photography.
3.cn: 总而言之，以上数据充分显示：假如您是单身一族，您（或者您认识的某个人）怎么说也得学点摄影技术。

1.en: I have a conclusion based on an observation. No, you don't. No, he doesn't.
1.cn: 通过观察我得出了一点结论。不，你没有。不，他没有。

2.en: Experiment complete. Conclusion, I have a sister. This was you? All of this was you?
2.cn: 实验结束。结论，我有个妹妹。这是你干的？都是你干的？！

3.en: Why would you do this, this pantomime? Why?! Conclusion three, you are terrified of her.
3.cn: 你为什么要这么做，搞这么一出？为什么？！结论三，你怕她怕得要死。

4.en: Can that be explained by blow-in? No, it's my conclusion that he's saving and replanting seeds. Thank you.
4.cn: 那能用风吹解释吗？不能，我的结论是他在留种做二次耕种谢谢你。

5.en: Anyways, I wanted you guys all to know that I've been taking a really hard look at things and come to the conclusion.
5.cn: 总之，我来是想告诉大家我很认真地审视了一遍自己，于是得出一个结论。

6.en: Murray has taken Matthew's letter to various authorities and their conclusion is that it demonstrates testamentary intention.
6.cn: 莫里把马修的信带去多个权威机构研究，他们的结论是信件表达了遗嘱的意向。

7.en: From the data at hand, you really can't draw that conclusion. All you can say with absolute certainty is that that joke is not funny here.
7.cn: 就目前的数据来说，你还不能得出这结论，你所能唯一确定的是这笑话在这儿不好笑。

8.en: Conclusion two, my sister, Eurus, apparently, has been incarcerated from an early age in a secure institution controlled by my brother. Hey, Bro!
8.cn: 结论二，我妹妹，欧罗斯，从小就被关在一个由我哥哥掌控的高警戒设施。你好，兄弟！

9.en: Sheldon, maybe living together is a bad idea. Well. Yeah, but what kind of scientists would we be, drawing a conclusion after only 12 hours of data?
9.cn: 谢尔顿，也许同居不是个好主意。仅仅凭12小时的数据就得出结论我们算是哪门子的科学家？

10.en: In doing so, he tries to follow a simple structure, with a clear beginning, middle, and end that links together his various points and builds to his conclusion.
10.cn: 操作下来，他试图遵循一个简单的架构，有清楚的开场白，中间精彩部分，以及结尾要乎相呼应到他所提及的要点与结论。

11.en: We don't want them jumping to the wrong conclusion about that Semtex. Do we?
11.cn: 我可不希望他们因为塑料炸药的事做出误判，你也应该不希望吧？

12.en: Now, I hoped you'd reach that conclusion on your own. But instead, you lied to me.
12.cn: 我本希望你自己能明白，但你却对我撒谎。

13.en: Yes, I have. And my only conclusion is the prescription he was picking up the other day was for cuckoo pills.
13.cn: 我想过唯一的解释就是，他那天开的药是治白痴的。

14.en: We've attempted to save our marriage, but after great effort, I've come to the conclusion that it can't be saved.
14.cn: 我们曾企图挽救我们的婚姻，但虽经过很多努力，我最终认识到我们的婚姻已不可挽救。

15.en: Well, Sheldon, you're his friend. Friends give each other presents. I accept your premise. I reject your conclusion.
15.cn: 谢尔顿，你是他朋友啊，朋友之间就是互送礼物的，我同意你的论据，但不同意你的论点。

16.en: The Singularity. When the system is capable of recursive self-improvement, when it is better at recalibrating, expanding and spawning than we are, the brief blip of humanity's reign will reach its inevitable conclusion.
16.cn: 就是奇点，当系统能够实现递归的自我强化，当它能更好地进行自我校准扩张与繁殖速度都超过我们时，人类短暂的统治将不可避免地走到尽头。

17.en: I thank you for allowing me to be a part of your conclusion of this chapter of your lives and the commencement of your next chapter to say that I'm honored doesn't even begin to quantify the depth of gratitude that really companies an honorary doctorate from Harvard.
17.cn: 感谢你们，让我有机会与你们共度人生这一华丽篇章的谢幕时刻并开启新的篇章。仅仅用荣幸一词无法表达出我对同时授予我的哈佛大学荣誉博士学位的感激之情。

18.en: Good morning, I'm Faustine Rhee. A parent's worst nightmare comes true this morning for David Kim. In a shocking and thoroughly mind-boggling conclusion to a story that's captivated the Bay Area, Margot Kim, missing now for five days, has just been tragically declared dead.
18.cn: 早上好，我是福斯汀·利。今天早上作为一位父亲大卫·金的最害怕的事情还是发生了。这件轰动了湾区的案件有了令人震惊和让人完全不能接受的定论，失踪了五天的玛戈·金，在不久前不幸地被宣告死亡。
